Title: Requires telemarketers to add a customer's telephone number to all do-not-call lists maintained by such telemarketer
Summary: Requires telemarketers to add a customer's telephone number to all do-not-call lists maintained by such telemarketer when a customer requests to add his or her number to any do-not-call list maintained by such telemarketer.
LawCode: Amd ยง399-z, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring telemarketers to add a customer's telephone number to all do-not-call lists maintained by such telemarketer
